scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run cover
scripts.commit: npm run lint && npm run build_all && git-cz
scripts.build_cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs   && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc tools/build/bundle.d.ts src/app.ts     -m commonjs --outDir dist/cjs      --sourcemap --sourceRoot src       --target ES5    -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node
scripts.build_es6: rm -rf dist/es6   && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc tools/build/target-es6.d.ts src/app.ts -m es2015   --outDir dist/es6      --sourcemap --sourceRoot src       --target ES2015 -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node
scripts.build_test: rm -rf spec-js   && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc tools/build/test.d.ts test/unit/app.ts -m commonjs --outDir spec-js       --sourcemap --sourceRoot test/unit --target ES5       --diagnostics --pretty                                     --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node
scripts.build_e2e: rm -rf .tmp && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc test/e2e/main.ts -m es2015 --outDir .tmp/e2e       --sourcemap --sourceRoot test/unit --target ES2015       --diagnostics --pretty                                     --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node && ./node_modules/.bin/ts-node ./tools/tasks/bundle.e2e.ts
scripts.watch_test: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc tools/build/test.d.ts test/unit/app.ts -m commonjs --outDir spec-js                                  --sourcemap --sourceRoot test      --target ES5       --diagnostics --pretty                                     --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node -w
scripts.build_mock: rm -rf dist/mock-es6 && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc mock/index.ts                      -m es2015   --outDir dist/mock-es6 --sourcemap --sourceRoot mock      --target ES2015 -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node && ./node_modules/.bin/ts-node ./tools/tasks/bundle.mock.ts
scripts.build_mock_cjs: rm -rf dist/mock-cjs && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc mock/index.ts  tools/build/bundle.d.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist/mock-cjs --sourcemap --sourceRoot mock      --target ES5    -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node
scripts.build_all: npm run build_es6 && npm run build_cjs && npm run build_bundle && npm run build_mock && npm run build_mock_cjs && npm run build_test && npm run build_e2e
